original: Blom, Allan Felix Herbert, bankdirektör, Karlskrona, f. 7/4/06 i N. Sol-berga, Jönköp. 1., av maskinmäst. Felix B. o. Elfrida Sjösten. Q. 35 m. Elsie Ekedahl. Barn: Håkan f. 37, Kerstin 40. — Realex. 23. Anst. v. A-B Smålands Banks avd :kont. i Vetlanda 24, kamr :assist. i Eksjö 27, bitr. å omb:m:exp. i Jönköp. 29, korresp. 31, rev. 33, tjf. kamr. 35, kont xhef o. kamr. i Nässjö 36, kontichef o. dir. i Karlskrona sed. 37, dir:assist. o. ställf. distr xhef 37. Led. av styr. f. Smål. Banks avd :kont. i Karlskrona sed. 37 samt av styr. f. bankens avd:-kont. i Holmsjö.
translated: Blom, Allan Felix Herbert, bank director, Karlskrona, born April 7th, 1906 in North Solberga, Jönköping County, the son of chief engineer Felix B. and Elfrida Sjösten. Married at the age of 35 to Elsie Ekedahl, they had two children: Håkan born in 1937, and Kerstin born in 1940. Blom attended Realexamen (secondary school leaving exam) at the age of 23. He started working at A-B Smålands Bank in the department office in Vetlanda in 1924, progressed to become a clerk assistant in Eksjö in 1927, and a deputy manager of accounting firm in Jönköping in 1929. He became a correspondence clerk in 1931, a revenue clerk in 1933, and temporary clerk in 1935. In 1936, he was appointed as a manager and clerk in Nässjö, then in 1937 became a bank director and head manager in Karlskrona, and deputy manager and manager of the district in 1937. Blom was a member of the board of directors for Smål. Banks department office in Karlskrona since 1937, and also a member of the board of directors for the banks department office in Holmsjö.
